title: The Facade
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Bernard J. Reis
provenance_text:
Helen Frankenthaler [1928-2011], New York, NY; Tibor de Nagy Gallery, New York, NY [1]; acquired by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, September 1955 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 105 (illustrated, plate 36) in "The 1955 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting" held at Carnegie Institute, October-December 1955. 
[2]. The painting was accessioned by Carnegie Institute before the opening of the exhibition; it was a gift of Mr. and Mrs. Bernard J. Reis, New York, NY and is identified as such in the exhibition catalogue.

creator.birth_place: New York City (New York state, United States)
